title: Silver Support Main (One Trick Thresh) - LF ADC / Jungler Duo!

embed.description: LexyTheDeer / Silver 4 82LP / 266W 318L Win Ratio 46% / Thresh - 84W 104L Win Ratio 45%, Blitzcrank - 69W 69L Win Ratio 50%, Jarvan IV - 42W 35L Win Ratio 55%, Alistar - 16W 16L Win Ratio 50%, Twitch - 7W 14L Win Ratio 33%

body:
Good day everyone.

So I'm looking for a duo, who would be interested in smashing solo queue.

Season 7 I was Gold 2, with a 53% win rate on Thresh over 490 games.. (Bronze 4 to Gold 2) 

Looking for someone to duo with on a regular bases, and try to reach to plat by end of season.

Discord is a huge preference, and ideally taking the game seriously. 

If your interested, add me in game.

replies.body:
Just make sure you play adc that are meta or he/she will patronize you as soon as you load in. 
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
